meta.description: Optimize the meal plan to meet nutritional targets at the minimum cost.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Different food options available for the meal plan.

params.name: protein
params.description: Protein content in grams for each food.

params.name: carbohydrates
params.description: Carbohydrate content in grams for each food.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of servings of each food.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(cost[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total cost of the meal plan.

constraints.name: protein_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(protein[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 70 grams of protein.

constraints.name: carbohydrates_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(carbohydrates[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
constraints.description: Ensure at least 117 grams of carbohydrates.

constraints.name: calories_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(calories[f] * x[f] for f in FOODS)
